subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Charitable Man has won three of his four lifetime starts, and Kiaran McLaughlin thinks that he just might have the horse to beat in 141st Belmont Stakes.
snippet: Charitable Man has won three of his four lifetime starts, and Kiaran McLaughlin thinks that he just might have the horse to beat in 141st Belmont Stakes.
